About Me

Some things to know...

BIO

My name is Rolando J Acevedo Jr. I was born and raised in North East Philadelphia. I graduated from Penn State University August 2018 with a BS in Information Science & Technology. Currently employed at the University of Providence IT department for over a year.

Certifications

Cisco

  • Cisco Certified Entry Networking Technician (CCENT)
  • CCNA Routing and Switching
  • CCNA Security
  • CCNA Cyber Ops (In progress)

Website Manager

University of Providence.

Current webmaster for the University of Providence webpage. Due to the lack of web administrator, I was given this extra responsibility because of the excellent quality of work I provided for my day-to-day responsibilities. Aside from some minor web projects I've done for myself, I had little experience with an enterprise level web project such as this. However, since being given this responsibility, I've been training myself with the most up-to-date industry standards and practices in order to best service the University website and help prep it for standard and technology changes to come.

Job Role

Service Desk Lead

I handle many daily tasks throughout the day. This includes: provinding training for over 30 staff and faculty, quickly handling incidents arriving by phone or ticketing system, checking Sophos Central to make sure computers are up to date and maintain security compliance on servers and end user systems. Over the summer I replaced and imaged every computer on campus while maintaining a detailed inventory list within our ticketing system.
